import React, { Component } from 'react'; import GetInstance from '../instance'; import { Menu, Card, Button, Divider, Form, Grid, Segment, Dimmer, Loader, List } from 'semantic-ui-react'; class StudentDashboard extends Component { static getInitialProps({ query }) { return { query }; } state = { account: '', loanAddress: '', web3: undefined, instance: undefined } async componentDidMount() { this.setState({ loanAddress: this.props.query.loanAddress }); const { web3, instance } = await new GetInstance().get(); const accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); this.setState({ web3, instance, account: accounts[0] }); } render() { return (
Edu-Ledger

Your Address:

{this.state.account}

Loan Address:

{this.state.loanAddress}

); } } export default StudentDashboard;
